short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 1-click reply to Craigslist posting! (Set your own message, too!)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPDATE: fixing keyboard shortcut; fixed wait time

Activate this extension by clicking it (or pressing Shift+Command+0) when you are on a craigslist page. The extension will automatically open a Gmail window with email address, subject line and custom message of your choice. (You can set a custom message by right-clicking the extension and selecting "Options".)

Happy hunting!
